Text.Page:
It is very dangerous to venture into the territory of our rivals, friend . Ergo, one could not ask for a better way to demonstrate one's courage.

To be viewed as a true hero in the Enlightened Union, slip into Free Traders territory and return with proof of your bravery. Slaying an Aurum basilisk, an Aurum fimbrilisk, and an Aurum fangspawn should be sufficient.

You survived, after all!

I was not convinced you could finish the mission. Many have tried, you see, but few have returned.

I am glad to see that you are the kind of person who can discern between a solemn vow and a foolish boast.

The Enlightened Union is honored to have you among us, my friend.
